name: Accentia
overview:
Accentia Technologies Limited provides business process management solutions for healthcare, financial, and insurance sectors. It offers medical billing and coding, insurance claim processing, receivables management/collections, and consultancy services. The company also provides business transcription services, which include board meeting, conference, press conference, training seminar, interview, and shareholder meeting transcription services.

In addition, it offers application development, application maintenance and customization, and business process reengineering services; an ASP solution; and enterprise consulting services, which include application architecture and design, development and maintenance, database administration, systems management, and performance optimization services. Further, the company provides GSR systems billing automation software; vscribes, a virtual scribing tool to enhance documentation rate of data at various end user locations; and MT software tracker, which is used to track the amount of transcription material sent for transcription and the agent assigned the work load of the client.
